definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]

second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

sentences.english: And now, I really know how to play ping pong .
sentences.chinese: 其实，我长大了后，如今，我的乒乓球艺还不错。

sentences.english: Studies on the orchid flora and its conservation of Kentin National Park.
sentences.chinese: 恳丁国家公园艺兰科植物相及其保育之研究。

sentences.english: It''s the high quality of Chinese ceramics that attracts American buyers.
sentences.chinese: 美国的顾客就是看上了中国陶瓷艺的高质量。

sentences.english: By the fountains at either end of the path huskers play music.
sentences.chinese: 街头艺人们则在小路两头的喷泉旁演奏着乐曲。

sentences.english: IT 's the high qual IT y of Chinese ceramics that attracts American buyers.
sentences.chinese: 美国的顾客就是看上了中国陶瓷艺的高质量。

sentences.english: Wang Xisan's art is representative of the Ji school.
sentences.chinese: 工艺艺美术家王习三是冀派的代表人物。

sentences.english: To peaceful arts shall envy bow.

definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

the Confucian Six Arts, namely: rites or etiquette 禮|礼[li3] (禮儀|礼仪[li3 yi2]), music 樂|乐[yue3] (音樂|音乐[yin1 yue4]), archery 射[she4] (射箭[she4 jian4]), charioteering 御[yu4] (駕車|驾车[jia4 che1]), calligraphy or literacy 書|书[shu1] (識字|识字[shi2 zi4]), mathematics or reckoning 數|数[shu4] (計算|计算[ji4 suan4])/another name for the Six Classics 六經|六经[Liu4 jing1]
pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn
dawn/daybreak/to know/to let sb know/to make explicit
to serve as an official/an official/the two chess pieces in Chinese chess guarding the "general" or "king" 將|将[jiang4]
